scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint, is depicted in a green robe with gold trim, holding a palm frond in his left hand and an open blue book in his right. The figure wears a tonsure and appears to be looking down at the book. The background is a light blue sky with scattered gold dots, suggesting a celestial or idealized setting. The overall composition is simple, focusing on the devotional attributes of the figure.
